long_description: The Solio Bolt solar charger keeps your electronic devices powered up on the go with an onboard battery and rotating solar panels. Solio Bolt charges popular USB-compatible gadgets including smartphones, MP3 players, e-readers, GPS units and cameras. Easy to use-simply connect the charger using your device's USB charging cable. Built-in battery will hold a charge for up to a year; at full charge the battery will provide most smartphones with at least 2 complete charges. The Solio Bolt solar charger can be charged from sunlight or USB port.
short_description: The Solio Bolt solar charger keeps your electronic devices powered up on the go with an onboard battery and rotating solar panels.
